meanings.sent1: The wound suppurates, causing it to ooze pus.
meanings.sent2: The infected pimple suppurates and needs to be treated.
meanings.sent3: The rotten fruit suppurates with a foul smell.
meanings.sent4: Her anger suppurates slowly, ready to burst at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The infected cut suppurates, creating a yellowish discharge.

meanings.sent1: The suppurates wound needed immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the suppurates abscess on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent3: The suppurates sore looked gross but was healing well.
meanings.sent4: The suppurates infection spread quickly throughout the body.
meanings.sent5: The suppurates wound was carefully cleaned to prevent further complications.
